H0.text: Mass production is the type of manufacturing system Ann is most likely using to make hats, where she makes hats for people and each person selects the fabric and hat style before she makes the hat to fit the person's head size.

H1.text: Custom production is the manufacturing system Ann most likely uses to make hats, because she creates each hat to the person's selected fabric and style and fits the hat to the individual's head size.

H2.text: Automated production is the type of manufacturing system most likely used by Ann, who makes hats for people and has each person select fabric and hat style before she makes the hat to fit the person's head size.

H3.text: Assembly line production is the manufacturing system most likely used by Ann, who makes hats for people by having each customer select the fabric and hat style before she customizes the hat to fit the head size.
